thread.title: Heather Watson forced to fight for Hong Kong quarter-final place - Milford Mercury
thread.title_full: Heather Watson forced to fight for Hong Kong quarter-final place - Milford Mercury - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Milford Mercury
title: Heather Watson forced to fight for Hong Kong quarter-final place - Milford Mercury
text:
Britain number two Heather Watson was made to fight for a place in the quarter-finals of the Hong Kong Open after beating Chinese Taipei qualifier Ya-Hsuan Lee in three sets. Watson, who fought back from a set down in her opening match, looked to be in cruise control after easing through the first set 6-0.
 Milford Mercury.
